data.text: I'm so sorry everyone. I've shown you all something so shameful…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
Oye, oye, why're you apologizing? You didn't 
cause any issues for us, ya know?
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text:
Plus the Japan Cup has some pretty amazing racers from around the 
globe in it. Coming in 4th ain't that bad.
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text:
Y-Yeah! The way you ran today was just as 
mesmerizing as usual, McQueen-san!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs

data.text:
Anyways, now that the race is over why don't 
we have Trainer treat us to something yummy? 
That won't be a problem, will it Trainer?
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text:
N-Nope! Not a problem at all! McQueen, feel free to eat as much 
as you want now that the Japan Cup is over!
data.name: <username>

data.text:
N-Nope! Not a problem at all! McQueen, feel free to eat as much 
as you want now that the Japan Cup is over!
data.name: <username>

data.text: I'm… going to have to refuse.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
I have to prepare for the Arima Kinen and I just 
finished that race, so I'm not hungry.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
Ah, I have to call Grandmother as well. 
I'll be taking my leave then.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: Everyone, I'm… I'm so sorry for today…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
That felt real forced… Anyways, you're 
real bad at acting, ya know?
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text: I'm sorry. I tried my best, but…
data.name: <username>

data.text: I'm sorry. I tried my best, but…
data.name: <username>

data.text:
I was upset with myself for being unsure whether or not I should 
call out to her or just leave her alone for a while.
I apologize for the intrusion.
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text: Ohh! If it isn't Oguri! Did you come to cheer on McQueen!?
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text: I came to see how the members of my former team were doing.
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text: But it doesn't seem like the star of the show is here.
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text: Hmm… it seems like something happened. So what is it?
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text: I decided to tell Oguri Cap everything that had happened.
I decided to tell Oguri Cap everything that had happened.

It began with the danger of our team being dissolved, and how we 
overcame that, which also brought in more members.

Due to the lowering of her placement in the much anticipated 
Spring Tenno Sho, she thought that this race was her chance to 
redeem herself. However, she ended up finishing in 4th place.

Currently, Mejiro McQueen is like a machine 
with cogs that don't work together.
I see… I think I understand how McQueen is feeling.
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
She is probably thinking that she has to live up 
to all of the expectations placed on her.
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text: Live up to all of the expectations…?
data.name: <username>

data.text: I have been there myself.
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
Having good results in your races breeds high expectations. 
Inevitably, you end up being tied down by said expectations…
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
And as these expectations grow they start feeling 
like obstacles to forward progress.
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text: These expectations begin feeling like obstacles…
data.name: <username>

data.text:
The only reason that this team is here today 
is thanks to Mejiro McQueen's efforts.

Every member of our team joined because of Mejiro McQueen's 
successes, and the only reason that they continue to run is 
because of their admiration for her.

And it isn't only the team members. I too was delighted by Mejiro 
McQueen's performance in her races, and because of that I've 
always had high expectations of her.

And it isn't only the team members. I too was delighted by Mejiro 
McQueen's performance in her races, and because of that I've 
always had high expectations of her.

Mejiro McQueen understood all of this, and as such struggled to 
live up to these expectations, alone.

During times like this it's your job as a trainer to turn these 
expectations into strength, not into obstacles.
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text: Turn these expectations into strength…
data.name: <username>

data.text:
Oguri… How did you turn expectations into 
strength? What did Sensei do to help?
data.name: <username>

data.text:
Oguri… How did you turn expectations into 
strength? What did Sensei do to help?
data.name: <username>

data.text: Hmm, while I wouldn't mind telling you…
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text: You and McQueen have a relationship that is unique to you two.
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
Doing it the same way we did would have no meaning 
to it… or at least that's what I think…
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text: A relationship… that is unique to us…
data.name: <username>

data.text: A relationship… that is unique to us…
data.name: <username>

data.text:
While I lack the experience and skill that Sensei had, Mejiro 
McQueen has always respected me as her trainer.

While I lack the experience and skill that Sensei had, Mejiro 
McQueen has always respected me as her trainer.

Why does Mejiro McQueen have so much faith 
in me? And what can I do for her…?

Why does Mejiro McQueen have so much faith 
in me? And what can I do for her…?

Hehe, that immediate reply… You really haven't 
changed since your days as a sub-trainer.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text: You've always put us before yourself.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
I see. That's all I can do. Staying by her side, believing in 
her, and supporting her no matter what happens is all I can do!

choices.text: I'm going to go look for McQueen!

data.text:
I see. That's all I can do. Staying by her side, believing in 
her, and supporting her no matter what happens is all I can do!

choices.text: I'm going to go look for McQueen!

data.text:
Hmm… Guess I'll take a look around the shopping district, the 
road to campus, and in front of the train station.
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text: I'll go check if McQueen-san is somewhere on campus!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs

data.text: I'll go and check around the race course!
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl

data.text: Then I'll go and check around the shrine.
data.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut

data.text: This time, our team's ace will rely on us!
data.name: <username>

data.text: This time, our team's ace will rely on us!
data.name: <username>
